overview: The first part filmed in 1999, completed in 2000, up until the liberation of the South of Lebanon in May 2000, it was impossible to go to Khiam detention camp, located in an area under israeli occupation and its proxy militia, the South Lebanon Army.  The second part: Video filmed in 2007, After the liberation of the South in 2000, the Khiam detention camp was transformed into a museum. It was completely destroyed during the israeli war on Lebanon in July 2006.
title: Khiam 2000-2007
